images.photo:
Insert it in your website for free
without any special skills or software
<head>Extensive customization options</head><body>for both Dock Menu and Gallery</body>
<head>Make your modifications in the right panel</head><body>Then hit the "generate settings XMLs" button</body>
<head>Create your own image transitions and text effects</head><body>or select them from existing lists using transitions and text effects generators</body>
<head>You can choose the fitting type for your images in the gallery</head><body>select from bestFit, boxFit or forceFit</body>
<head>You can put the Dock Menu on any position over the Gallery</head><body>And you can have it hidden on mouse out or have it fixed</body>
<head>Put your own images and text in the "images" folder</head><body>and update the XML files from the same folder accordingly</body>
You can put links in this HTML/CSS formatted textand you can also put links behind the big images
